title: Goth Gorp with Arc’teryx Creative Director Cooper Gill
description:
Batten down the taped seams and say your prayers for every dead bird because this week the boys are dialing in Cooper Gill, creative director of Arc’teryx. Cooper is coming in live from Vancouver HQ to talk gorp’s stranglehold on 2020 and beyond, what it’s like collaborating with partners such as Palace and Jil Sander, managing Arc’s Artist Series, the Virgil Abloh and Frank Ocean effect, gatekeeping, filling big shoes as only the second CD in company history, what the fuck a creative director even does and much more on this episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
Throwing Fits x Seasons: Use promo code “throwingfits” at checkout or subscribe at http://szns.co/throwingfits
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
